channel.title: Administration on Adam Israel
channel.description: Recent content in Administration on Adam Israel

item.title: You can take the grey out of his beard, but Unix stays in a man’s blood.
item.description: I sat down this morning, meaning to write a blog post about focus and patience, with OCD tendencies. It would have been my first substantial post since the beginning of the month, but when I logged in to WordPress I found my site unresponsive. Temperamental, even. Other sites I host on the same server, but different accounts, were fine. I was about to blame my half-full cup of coffee when Google interceded and warned me that my site was being suspicious as all fuck.
